AskHowManyWins.say: How many times do I have to beat you in rock paper scissors to be the ultimate winner?

AskUserChoice.say: I made my choice already, what's your choice? rock, paper or scissors?
AskUserChoice.reprompt: what's your choice? rock, paper or scissors?

TiedResult.say: Oh! we tied on this one. Great minds think alike, they say. I'll beat you in the next round.

UserWins.say: Oh, you won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

AlexaWins.say: I won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

UserWinsTheGame.say: You won the game! congratulations, it was a great match.

Bye.say: That's all right, until next time!

Help.say: This is the classic rock paper scissors. You can start a new game by saying start rain assessment, you can check the score by saying what is the score, you can stop the game by saying stop

ScoreResult.say: You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

CurrentScore.say: The score right now is: Alexa {alexaWins}, you {userWins}. Are you sure you want to start a new game?

ConfirmMaxWins.say: {maxWins} is a big number, are you sure you want to play until one of us wins {maxWins} times?

NoIdea.say: I'm sorry, I didn't understand what you said. You can start a new game by saying start a new game, you can check the score by saying what is the score
